trans-unit.source: Provides a component editor for the <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.Triggers*> collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel"></xref> controls.
trans-unit.target: 提供的元件編輯器<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.Triggers*>集合<xref href="System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel"></xref>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.Triggers*>

trans-unit.source: The UpdatePanelTriggerCollectionEditor class provides a user interface for editing triggers of the <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control.
trans-unit.target: UpdatePanelTriggerCollectionEditor 類別進行編輯的觸發程序提供的使用者介面<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>

trans-unit.source: A trigger can be an <xref:System.Web.UI.AsyncPostBackTrigger> or a <xref:System.Web.UI.PostBackTrigger> object.
trans-unit.target: 觸發程序可以是<xref:System.Web.UI.AsyncPostBackTrigger>或<xref:System.Web.UI.PostBackTrigger>物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.PostBackTrigger> </xref:System.Web.UI.AsyncPostBackTrigger>

trans-unit.source: An instance of the UpdatePanelTriggerCollectionEditor class can be invoked by selecting the ellipsis button (**…**) on the <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.Triggers%2A> property in the visual designer's property grid control.
trans-unit.target: 可以叫用 UpdatePanelTriggerCollectionEditor 類別的執行個體，藉由選取省略符號按鈕 (**...**) 上<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.Triggers%2A>視覺化設計工具屬性方格控制項中的屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.Triggers%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.UpdatePanelTriggerCollectionEditor"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.UpdatePanelTriggerCollectionEditor"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] internally constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.UpdatePanelTriggerCollectionEditor> class when the ellipsis button (…) is clicked on the <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.Triggers%2A> property in the visual designer's property grid control at design time.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]在內部建立的新執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.UpdatePanelTriggerCollectionEditor>類別時的省略符號按鈕 （...） 按<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.Triggers%2A>視覺化設計工具屬性方格控制項在設計階段中的屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.Triggers%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.UpdatePanelTriggerCollectionEditor>

trans-unit.source: The type of the trigger to edit.
trans-unit.target: 若要編輯的觸發程序類型。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether multiple triggers can be selected at the same time.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否可以在同時選取多個觸發程序。

trans-unit.source: The CanSelectMultipleInstances method always returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: CanSelectMultipleInstances 方法一律會傳回`false`。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, only one trigger can be selected every time that the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.UpdatePanelTriggerCollectionEditor> object is used.
trans-unit.target: 因此，只有一個觸發程序可以選取每次的<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.UpdatePanelTriggerCollectionEditor>物件使用。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.UpdatePanelTriggerCollectionEditor>

trans-unit.source: A trigger can be an <xref:System.Web.UI.AsyncPostBackTrigger> or a <xref:System.Web.UI.PostBackTrigger> object.
trans-unit.target: 觸發程序可以是<xref:System.Web.UI.AsyncPostBackTrigger>或<xref:System.Web.UI.PostBackTrigger>物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.PostBackTrigger> </xref:System.Web.UI.AsyncPostBackTrigger>

trans-unit.source: Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the data type that this collection edits.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個集合所編輯的資料類型。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.UpdatePanelTrigger"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.UpdatePanelTrigger"> </xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the multiple data types that the collection editor can create.
trans-unit.target: 取得集合編輯器可以建立多個資料類型。

trans-unit.source: The types that the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.UpdatePanelTriggerCollectionEditor> instance can create are <xref:System.Web.UI.AsyncPostBackTrigger>, <xref:System.Web.UI.PostBackTrigger>, and other types that derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanelControlTrigger> class.
trans-unit.target: 型別，<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.UpdatePanelTriggerCollectionEditor>可以建立執行個體是<xref:System.Web.UI.AsyncPostBackTrigger>， <xref:System.Web.UI.PostBackTrigger>，和其他類型的衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanelControlTrigger>類別</xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanelControlTrigger></xref:System.Web.UI.PostBackTrigger></xref:System.Web.UI.AsyncPostBackTrigger></xref:System.Web.UI.Design.UpdatePanelTriggerCollectionEditor>

trans-unit.source: An array of the data types that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.UpdatePanelTriggerCollectionEditor"></xref> can create.
trans-unit.target: 陣列的資料類型， <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.UpdatePanelTriggerCollectionEditor"> </xref>可以建立。

trans-unit.source: Edits the value of the specified object by using the specified service provider and context.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的服務提供者和內容，編輯指定物件的值。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> object that provides additional context information.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref>提供額外的內容資訊的物件。

trans-unit.source: A service provider object that provides editing services.
trans-unit.target: 提供編輯服務的服務提供者物件。

trans-unit.source: The object whose value will be edited.
trans-unit.target: 將編輯其值的物件。

trans-unit.source: The new value of the object.
trans-unit.target: 物件的新值。
